name: Carcinosin
details: It is claimed the Carcinosin acts favorably and modifies all cases in which either a history of carcinoma can be elicited, or symptoms of the disease itself exist. (J. H. Clarke, M.D.) Carcinoma of the mammary glands with great pain and induration of glands; of uterus, the offensive discharge, hemorrhage and pain are greatly relieved. Indigestion, accumulation of gas in stomach and bowels; rheumatism - Cancerous cachexia.
